case.title: Submissive girlfriend wanted - 38 (London)
case.text:
Requirement: short to long term relationship
Me: 5'9" tall, white, Britsh, respectful, works in a technical field, creative hobby
You: 25-45, slim to curvy, intelligent, sensitive, sensual, enoys all the usual things in life, a regular confident exterior that hides submissive tendencies in bed
Please email to discuss further if this piques your interest...
